name: io.github.sunshad0w/html2md
title: HTML to Markdown MCP Server
description: Converts HTML webpages to clean Markdown format. Reduces HTML size by 90-95% while preserving tables, images, and links. Supports both fast fetch mode and browser mode with Playwright for JavaScript-heavy sites.

tools.name: html_to_markdown
tools.description: Converts HTML from a URL to clean Markdown format

parameters.url: URL of the webpage to convert
parameters.max_size: Maximum content size in bytes (1MB-50MB, default: 10MB)
parameters.use_cache: Enable caching for faster repeated conversions (default: false)
